website_summaries.verdict: A durable bamboo butcher block that has anti-bacterial properties for cutting meat.
pros: At 2-inches thick and 8.5 pounds, this butcher block has a durable feel and size
Organic bamboo provides anti-bacterial and anti-microbial properties naturally
Great looking block that will also work as a serving tray
cons: Wood used in this block may crack, chip, or split over time

customer_reviews.title: Solid well constructed addition to the kitchen
customer_reviews.text: It is a beautiful butcher block that I gave as a gift to a family member who absolutely loved it. I was nervous about it as the price was lower than I expected. When it arrived I was very happy and excited to gift to my cousin who is is very big into smoking meats and had been looking for one.
customer_reviews.author: jack wood

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: 3+ years of daily use. both blocks have no cracks, no splinters, no chips. of course heavy discoloration that I don't care about.
customer_reviews.author: igordin

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t hold up to serious chopping
customer_reviews.text: It’s big and it’s heavy, but it doesn’t hold up well to serious chopping like it says. I really wanted to like this chopping board, but I’ll be looking for one that doesn’t chip away. I can’t risk having chopping board pieces in my food.
customer_reviews.author: Amy F.

customer_reviews.title: When the description says "heavy" they mean "HEAVY".
customer_reviews.text: My fault for not carefully reading the description. It is exactly what it says it is "Thick Heavy & Solid". I bought it for my elderly father so he has a large area for cutting up veg and such. But I can't use it for that; I'm afraid of it falling and breaking his foot. (This isn't an exaggeration.) I had to buy a large, light weight polymer board for him to use. Still figuring out what to do with this one, since it is a very nice cutting board. If you have a counter where you will leave it, perfect. But it isn't something you want to get out and put away for every use.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Impressive though finish is a little rough
customer_reviews.text: Just received this and it looks nice. However, I would have expected a better finish on this block. It is somewhat rough to the touch. I will probably end up taking a fine sander to it. It does sit level and is heavy enough that it shouldn't slip on the counter top. I have washed it and oiled it. I think some paste would be a good idea as well. Overall, despite the somewhat rough finish, it seems like a nice product. I will see how it holds up. PS: Just for product accuracy sake, note that the "neet" label now appears on the side edge rather than on the top surface as shown in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I open the package it got a chip on the center:(
customer_reviews.author: MaryGrace Valencia

customer_reviews.title: The cutting board I received looked nothing like this. The top was different and appeared cheap
customer_reviews.text: The cutting board I received looked nothing like this. The top was different and appeared cheap. Either they sent a product with a poor surface, or maybe the manufacturer should provide an front-facing photo.
customer_reviews.author: The Day’s

customer_reviews.title: It’s heavy sturdy built and great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Use for about everything except for breaking or cutting Garlic! Use a separate smaller board for that!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy.
customer_reviews.text: This is how I received the item. Not fair that I have to jump through hoops to get my money back . It should be an instant refund.
customer_reviews.author: Pie

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: Keep in mind that you need to keep from submerses in water, will crack
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Roth

customer_reviews.title: Good for chicken and possibly zombies?
customer_reviews.text: This board is pretty solid. I mean, all I've cut on it so far has been chicken and vegetables but I bet if one were so inclined they could butcher a whole zombie on it if we ever got to that point in the upcoming apocalypse.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Branch

customer_reviews.title: It looks great on the counter and it is durab;e!
customer_reviews.text: It is a beautiful cutting board. Very true to the photo! Durable and it does up and clean very easily!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Great cutting board. I just wish it was a little bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Papa

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and reasonable priced cutting block
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice cutting board that sits high on my counter top and is very stable. I also use it for putting something out of the oven on to protect my counter top. I highly recommend this cutting block.
customer_reviews.author: waterbaby

customer_reviews.title: Great cutting board
customer_reviews.text: Very well made and came right away. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mark D. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Cleans up nice.
customer_reviews.text: I put it to use tonight. Couldn't be happier. Don't have to worry about hurting it. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Big Bri

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift for Dad
customer_reviews.text: HUGE! and my dad loved it! works as both serving block and cutting block. Great for the person in your life who loves to serve up large portions of meat. My dad usually makes lamb or goat and needs a nice big block to prep the meat for the family. I oiled it for him too with some mineral oil.
customer_reviews.author: Julio Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Not level; wobbles on counter.
customer_reviews.text: The board is nice, thick, heavy, and stays on the counter. The ONE problem I have is that it is uneven and wobbles. My other cutting board doesn't do this, so it's definitely this block. I would buy again assuming it was level.
customer_reviews.author: Derrick S.

customer_reviews.title: The best cutting board ever!
customer_reviews.text: Heavy but that’s good. Excellent craftmanship. I will enjoy using it for years. Thank you, Neet!
customer_reviews.author: debbie

customer_reviews.title: Thick, sturdy, heavy.
customer_reviews.text: So thick and sturdy, I don't even bother treating them with oil. My old thin one started to delaminate after a couple of years. I doubt these will break down. The hand holds are convenient. But they are heavy.
customer_reviews.author: El Kati

customer_reviews.title: Very Sharp looking
customer_reviews.text: Just the Butcher Cutting Block that I hoped it would be. I have not tried it yet; I will wait for the oil and wax to apply. It looks and feels well built and I believe will work for me, much better than the solid wood chopping block.
customer_reviews.author: shihan5d

customer_reviews.title: Good quality!
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice cutting cutting board. We have not used it yet. It looks very well made.
customer_reviews.author: velochi

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: I'm so happy I decided to order these cutting boards. They are high quality and beautiful pieces. I am very pleased with the sizes and I love the thickness of them. My last cutting board was so thin and flimsy and didn't last very long. I see these lasting me a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Marie C

customer_reviews.title: Nice, heavy board that so far doesn't seem to ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice, heavy board that so far doesn't seem to score with each cut. I did get the oil also and apply that after each use - it's nice looking enough to keep out on the sink all the time!
customer_reviews.author: Audrey Cali

customer_reviews.title: Great block off the old chip.
customer_reviews.text: Nice bamboo chopping block. Smooth and tough, a perfect fit and looks great on my kitchen counter. Love it. Sal
customer_reviews.author: Sal

customer_reviews.title: Good board but constant un-natural smell keeps me up at night
customer_reviews.text: The cutting board is great but out of the plastic wrapping there is this constant smell that I can't seem to get rid of. I've used mineral oil, soap and hot water but no matter what I do I still can't seem to get it to not smell. It's a very off putting smell that I have a hard time explaining. I doubt bamboo smells like this.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Great cutting board.
customer_reviews.text: It is very tough and well built. I especially love that you can pick it up easily with the grooves on the sides. Cleans easy & perfect size too. Pricey at $45, but the quality worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Murlyn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My favorite boards to use my MAC knives with. You will be happy with these.
customer_reviews.author: Michael E. Walker

customer_reviews.title: well made and really nice looking board
customer_reviews.text: Such a niceboard, heavy duty, well made and really nice looking board.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: its ok for being so cheap, starts to peel strands of wood after first wash :/
customer_reviews.author: Valafar

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking cutting boards
customer_reviews.text: Really attractive and functional! They needed a little smoothing and oiling.
customer_reviews.author: C. Madden

customer_reviews.title: Almost too beautiful to use
customer_reviews.text: Almost too beautiful to use! They are thick and solid, but not too heavy, and they provide a very nice cutting surface. Oil them well before first use--I used hemp oil.
customer_reviews.author: Ettie81

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the size of the board and trying to take care of it also
customer_reviews.author: Illusions

customer_reviews.title: have not had very long
customer_reviews.text: this is a very nice board so far - but it needs rubber feet for slippage ( which we bought after we learned that )
customer_reviews.author: Wilma

customer_reviews.title: These are very nice cutting boards
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice cutting boards. And it is very nice to have two sizes. They seem heavy duty and look very well made. Will be proud to have them sitting on my butcher block cart in kitchen
customer_reviews.author: Sandy H

customer_reviews.title: looks great
customer_reviews.text: Nice heavy and thick cutting block. Only thing I would like is if it had feet on the bottom. Hope it wears well and lasts.
customer_reviews.author: maureen Lerch

customer_reviews.title: A Cut above
customer_reviews.text: These replaced a set we had for 10+ years. Loving them so far. Attractive and appear to be durably built.
customer_reviews.author: John Machacek

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: It’s very sturdy and just what I Needed for cooking
customer_reviews.author: brianna montiel

customer_reviews.title: Dont bother with this
customer_reviews.text: Horrible after a few weeks warped had to returned it
customer_reviews.author: gustavo blain

customer_reviews.title: Nice Cutting board set for a great price.
customer_reviews.text: I love this set. Easy to clean, The price was what really reeled me in. Perfect for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Lia Klobucher

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be good quality. Solid construction and heavy
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be good quality. Solid construction and heavy. I just received them yesterday but I can already tell they are much better quality than the plastic boards I replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: It is a Christmas gift so I can not review it at this time./
customer_reviews.author: Donna Fonda

customer_reviews.title: This is a decent cutting block for the price, ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent cutting block for the price, but the workmanship is mediocre. I can clearly see the joints/seam where the bamboo is pressed together to make this. So I have my doubts with the longevity of this product. Other than that, it's okay!
customer_reviews.author: Ahmed A.

customer_reviews.title: Very thick, very sturdy, recommended a+
customer_reviews.text: These cutting boards are amazing!! I've been using them for months and they are still in perfect condition! They're very thick and very sturdy. I totally recommend it:) thank you for these awesome cutting boards! I will definitely be a returning customer!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Got this for my daughter it is super heavy and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughter it is super heavy and beautiful. She loves it. Going to get one for myself and my son.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great cutting board
customer_reviews.text: Great cutting board, heavy and sturdy. I bought this for my wife because the one we had slides on granite counter top due to light weight. This Neet is heavy and stays in place.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel M.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: fine purchase, Am glad I went with this beautiful piece .

customer_reviews.title: sturdy butcher block
customer_reviews.text: Solid, sturdy butcher block. I leave it out on my counter and it looks great!

customer_reviews.title: Very heavy, sturdy cutting boards
customer_reviews.text: I would totally buy these again, they are very thick and sturdy I love my cutting boards.

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: This board is easier to clean than the regular wood board. So far so good.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely AWESOME! In fact, it's eight and a half pounds of AWESOMENESS!!

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Great butcher block and as described, good size for preparing and entertaining. Easy to wash and keep oiled and good quality.

customer_reviews.title: nice combo of large and small bamboo cutting boards
customer_reviews.text: very nice bamboo cutting boards. smaller one serves perfectly for my wife's homemade bread.
customer_reviews.author: RLL

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful cutting boards!
customer_reviews.text: These cutting boards are really terrific! I love their thickness - very sturdy! The handle is very helpful when washing. Make sure you oil your wooden cutting boards every month or so, this keeps them from drying out and helps protect against bacteria. I have a hanging cutting board holder and both these boards fit. If you found my review helpful, please click Yes below! :)
customer_reviews.author: madeline audreyTop Contributor: Health & Wellness

customer_reviews.title: It is a beautiful cutting board with great craftmanship
customer_reviews.text: The company's name is Neet, and their board lives up to their name! It is a beautiful cutting board with great craftmanship. It is thick and heavy, and looks great on the counter! It's big and gives you the perfect amount of room to cut things up without pieces flying off of it. I am purchasing some oil to condition it over the years, and know that it will be used and loved for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Praisinyahweh

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great cutting board set. Love the handles that are built in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: the bamboo is great, because it's not a porous wood that soaks ...
customer_reviews.text: A heavy, solid cutting board.the bamboo is great,because it's not a porous wood that soaks up water and bacteria.and the side handles are very handy also.
customer_reviews.author: Brian edwards

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: This cutting out board is everything I expected. Very nice
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Kovach

customer_reviews.title: A great deal!
customer_reviews.text: They're thicker, sturdier, and more attractive than I expected. A great deal!
customer_reviews.author: DrLeo9

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Piece!
customer_reviews.text: This board is a beautiful and functional addition to my new kitchen! Construction is solid and so far, it's holding up nicely to everyday use. It will slip on granite countertops but this was easily remedied by attaching 4 rubber stick-ons purchased at HD for a few bucks. I did a lot of research and so happy that I chose this one!
customer_reviews.author: Donna W

customer_reviews.title: Terrible cutting board.
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this zero stars, I would. This is not one solid piece of wood and after two weeks the board started splitting creating a crevice where bacteria and mold can grow. Completely unsanitary.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Son

customer_reviews.title: They look great but I've only used them a dozen times or ...
customer_reviews.text: They look great but I've only used them a dozen times or so and the small one already developed a crack in it.
customer_reviews.author: AndrewR

customer_reviews.title: Quality Butcher Block
customer_reviews.text: This bamboo butcher block is EXACTLY what I was wanting. I absolutely love the handles on the sides for easy movement from counter to table. My one complaint was that I received the block with a ding on one side. It was clearly dropped or hit with something because the plastic wrap on the outside was messed up too. Its not so distracting that someone other than me would notice but it did leave a small jagged edge that I had to slightly sand to keep it from splintering and cutting my hand. Overall, even with the small ding, I highly recommend this block. The quality is really great and the size is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Lwil

customer_reviews.title: First impresion so far: Great
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was quick. The cutting board is thick and heavy enough to stay in place while using it. Good size board. It fits the counter top with good clearance around it. I found the finger grooves on both ends are sharp to the hands. They could use a good rounding over. I really like the bamboo end grain. It just seems to help the knife to cut meat better, in my opinion. I plan to wipe it down with some food grade finish oil.
customer_reviews.author: Dingodog

customer_reviews.title: Chop it
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Had this and a couple large Boos boards on my wish list. Was not sure on the size for this one. My wife bought this for me for my birthday and it's actually the perfect size and quality board. Love it. I put some board conditioner and oil on it prior to use and it looks as good as it functions. Im pretty strict with my reviews, but this is an easy 5 star product.
customer_reviews.author: j rocket

customer_reviews.title: Yes!
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is this. This board is good looking, good quality, heavy and awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Theloneoverlander

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition to the kitchen counter.
customer_reviews.text: These are nicely weighted, thicker than standard, very attractive cutting boards. My wife got the small one and I used the larger one for a project. I'm going to admit that I actually re-purposed the larger board as a base for a speaker stand. It was so pretty and I wanted to reveal only the outer, thick edges below my hardware. This is so fairly priced I couldn't find a better, cheaper alternatives.
customer_reviews.author: - Tech been good to me -

customer_reviews.title: Lovely to look at great to use and of course Formaldehyde Free!
customer_reviews.text: Organic Bamboo cutting boards are lovely. You can leave them out on the counter since they look so nice. Also, I contacted the seller, and for anyone who has concerns, quote "Yes our products are free of this chemical. Formaldehyde is not FDA approved for food grade cooking utensils and supplies like cutting boards and all of our products are FDA approved. Thanks for your inquiry."
customer_reviews.author: Southern GAL

customer_reviews.title: Tough board
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my daughter. Impressed! Bamboo really cleans up well unlike other wood cutting boards. Doesn't stain either. This one is a keeper.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Natural, Attractive, Bamboo Cutting Boards
customer_reviews.text: These bamboo cutting boards are very nice. They are good size, very solid, and thick. They look and feel very professional. The bamboo pattern is also very attractive. I like the fact that there are 2 of them because my wife can use one and I can use the other at the same time. I also like the fact that they are made out of natural bamboo instead of the old plastic one that I had. I feel much better cutting on natural bamboo than on plastic that may end up in my food I received this product at discount
customer_reviews.author: TramMi Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Good size
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves this cutting board. She likes that it does not have groves around the edge to catch liquids. Go figure I would have thought that you would want groves. Not her...
customer_reviews.author: R. W. Sharp

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, heavy cutting board
customer_reviews.text: The board is a gift and has not been opened yet, but it is beautiful. It is heavy and not so big that it’s awkward, but a good size for countertop prep.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Dick

customer_reviews.title: These came highly recommended to me by my mom
customer_reviews.text: These came highly recommended to me by my mom, however, even after I seasoning them with coconut oil, they immediately looked scratchy & weathered (1 month old). Additionally, the bottom part of it got mildew after hand washing & laying on a drying mat to dry (I guess the water got trapped at the bottom?), but I've had other wood cutting boards for years that never grew mildew. As it's beyond the return window, I'm stuck with them, but can't say they're my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Raquel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: I love the size, I’m able to chop multiple veggies and leave them on one side of the board while I chop more. It is sturdy, it is lighter than my old cutting board but still a little hefty. The lip around the edge is a nice touch!!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Brown

customer_reviews.title: Nice and heavy
customer_reviews.text: Nice and heavy, holding up well. The bottom lays flat, so you have to make sure to thoroughly dry your surface before setting it down. Not a con really, just something my last board had that I took for granted (it had ridges on the side so there was a bit of empty space underneath when laying flat)
customer_reviews.author: mastamokei

customer_reviews.title: Good wood block
customer_reviews.text: Quality wood block which was given as a Christmas gift along with the Caron & Doucet oil and wax set. Recipient is very happy with the block's performance, and he's a chef. I looked at several options before purchasing this item.
customer_reviews.author: L. Burkett

customer_reviews.title: It makes me a little nervous to slice against it with my nice knife. But I do anyway
customer_reviews.text: Well made, though much harder than I had anticipated. It makes me a little nervous to slice against it with my nice knife. But I do anyway, and so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Kael Shipman

customer_reviews.title: Superior quality for great value
customer_reviews.text: Best quality cutting boards I own and you cannot beat the price. Highly recommended!!!
customer_reviews.author: B Nab

customer_reviews.title: Great cutting board.
customer_reviews.text: Suggest following the oiling instructions as it does look and feel better as it ages.
customer_reviews.author: Rick, Gallup, NM

customer_reviews.title: Very well made, thick, heavy cutting board
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautifully made & very heavy butcher block cutting board. I am very pleased with the craftsmanship & the quality of this item. Well worth the cost!
customer_reviews.author: Hamby Family

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The product was cracked and had a dent in the corner about the size of a thumbprint.
customer_reviews.author: Rhea

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice cutting board
customer_reviews.text: Pretty nice cutting board ! I was impressed . If i had any advice to the manufacturer it would be to add a brochure with care instructions on it and thats really it ! If your on the fence about getting this , don’t be , its awesome !
customer_reviews.author: Erich

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This cutting board is sturdy, well made and quite beautiful to look at. It is thick and heavy and extremely good value for money. It is exactly what I wanted and would definitely recommend.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: working very nice till now since we bought these few months back. We liked these boards.

customer_reviews.text: Beautiful cutting board. Really solid and a decent size. I was hoping it would be a bit bigger but this should work out just fine. It's nice and heavy and a beautiful natural wood color.

customer_reviews.title: Cracked almost in half in less than a month!
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed! After one month of use, it began to create a very large crack!

customer_reviews.title: Love it. I’ve used it quite a bit
customer_reviews.text: Love it. I’ve used it quite a bit. Good clean cutting board. I use the Caron and Doucet cutting board oil after each use. Still looks like new.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Davis

customer_reviews.title: Heavy and sturdy, good for when I chop whole chicken
customer_reviews.text: Yesss! Heavy and sturdy, good for when I chop whole chicken.

customer_reviews.title: Lasted less than 1 year
customer_reviews.text: I started using these boards in early January 2016. I washed them by hand and oiled them regularly. Two of the cutting boards split in half by October 2016.

customer_reviews.title: good cutting board
customer_reviews.text: good cutting board, cleans up nice, the mineral oil isn't easy to find, not at the drug stores I went to, brought mine at bed bath and beyond. make sure you put enough oil and let it dry good.
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: Cutting boards.
customer_reviews.text: Good looking cutting boards, good enough to use as a serving board. Have stood up to daily use. Appreciate the low cost.

customer_reviews.title: Nice cutting boards
customer_reviews.text: Nice cutting boards. This is my first set of bamboo cutting boards and I'm impressed at their resistance to scratching. Hopefully they'll work well over the long term.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: i am a former chef, and i know quality when i see it, for the money, get it
customer_reviews.author: RICHARD CUNDARI

customer_reviews.title: I'll be sending this back which is unfortunate because I imagine if you get a good one they are fine
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a Christmas gift but ours had a flaw. This cutting board is BIG and HEAVY duty however there was a natural gouge about 4 cm long right in the middle of our board running along the bamboo grain. Unfortunately this flaw is rough bamboo and will harbor multiple organisms and all kinds of food particles. I'll be sending this back which is unfortunate because I imagine if you get a good one they are fine. This is also going to be quite difficult to return package as it's quite large and heavy. I'll be sending unprotected in a box just as it was shipped to us.
customer_reviews.author: RockyMtn

customer_reviews.title: Love this cutting board
customer_reviews.text: Love this cutting board. Perfect size and sturdy. Just the right size for my apartment size kitchen. Highly recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Gayle Rapolla

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love bamboo and I'm filling my kitchen with bamboo kitchen utensils. These are fabulous and they look great too!
customer_reviews.author: ElizabethW

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just beautiful only problem is its so pretty I don't want to cut on it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just as expected. This one will grow old with ...
customer_reviews.text: Just as expected. This one will grow old with me.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product and good value. I would purchase for anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Alina J Urbanec

customer_reviews.title: very nice cutting boards
customer_reviews.text: very nice cutting boards. look and feel like top dollar products. glad i purchased!! sought out cooking utensils from same company and they have been great too.
customer_reviews.author: Brett

product_meta.title: EXTRA LARGE Bamboo Cutting Board Butcher Block By Neet - Thick Heavy & Solid (16.5"x 12" x 2" Inch) Natural Organic Wood Wooden Serving Trays & Cheese Platters Great Chef Kitchen Gift
feature_bullets: ✅ A TRUE BUTCHER’S BLOCK FOR EVERY FOOD-LOVER. Stop chopping your pricey ribeye or T-bone steaks on flimsy cutting board that crack and dull your knife every time you strike. The Neet ultimate heavy-duty chopping block is here to make meal prep and chopping a breeze!

✅ THICKER, HEAVIER & STURDIER THAN EVER. Our 100% organic bamboo butcher cutting block is 2-inches thick and weighs a whopping 8.5 pounds, so you can rest assured that it take abuse from your butchering and won't damage your expensive knives!

✅ A MUST-HAVE FOR EVERY FAMILY. Our moso bamboo is naturally anty-bakterial and anty-mikrobial, while its dense construction and natural finish will not absorb unpleasant odors. Plus, it will look absolutely stunning on your counter-top or work station!

✅ SO MUCH MORE THAN A SIMPLE BUTCHER BLOCK. You can use the Neet bamboo chopping block for cutting meat, poultry or veggies and once you’re done, it can double as a serving tray or cheese platter and add a rustic touch to your dinners!
